info.title: About snapshots
info.description: A snapshot is an instant image of your VPS. You can restore your VPS to this state at any time.

confirm.create: Current snapshot will be replaced. Continue?
confirm.restore: VPS will be restored to snapshot state. Continue?
confirm.delete: Do you really want to delete this snapshot?
